mapper.insert: insert into cm_friend_link (id, tenant_id, group_name, link, name, picture, open_target, order_no, creator, creator_name, create_time) values(#{id}, #{tenantId}, #{groupName}, #{link}, #{name}, #{picture}, #{openTarget}, #{orderNo}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, now())
mapper.select: select * from cm_friend_link where tenant_id=#{tenantId} and id=#{id}
